text:
Gilberto Agustoni (26 July 1922 – 13 January 2017) was a Swiss Roman Catholic prelate. He served as the Prefect of the Apostolic Signatura from 1994 to 1998. He was later a Cardinal-Priest of the Roman Catholic Church. He was born in Schaffhausen.
Agustoni died on 13 January 2017 at the age of 94.

annotations.surface_form: Cardinal-Priest of the Roman Catholic Church
